requirement_tested: A static website with no dynamic data requirements
user_persona: A freelance web developer evaluating tech stack options for a client project.
user_goal: To confirm that the website does not require backend services or databases since it's purely informational.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Site Architecture
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and checks network requests in DevTools to verify there are no calls to APIs or database connections.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools > Network tab and refresh the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only static asset requests (HTML, CSS, JS, images) appear; no XHR/fetch requests to backend endpoints.

requirement_tested: Frontend pages for software solutions and staffing business introduction
user_persona: A small business owner exploring potential IT partners.
user_goal: To understand what services the company offers within software development and staffing.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Services Page
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on the 'Services' link in the navigation menu hoping to learn about available offerings.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Services' link in the top navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Services page loads, showing two distinct service categories: Custom Software Development and IT Staffing Solutions.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Service Details
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by the overview, Jamie clicks 'Learn More' under each service to get additional context.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Learn More' button below each service card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click expands the respective service description inline without reloading the page.

user_persona: An operations manager researching ERP and CRM systems for her company.
user_goal: To compare product features and determine suitability for internal use.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Products Section
narrative_steps.description: Patricia navigates to the Products page from the main navigation to explore available software tools.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Products' link in the header navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A responsive grid of product cards appears, each featuring an image, title, and summary.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Product Details
narrative_steps.description: Interested in the ERP system, Patricia clicks on its card to read more specifics.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)' product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is redirected to a dedicated product detail page with comprehensive information.

user_persona: A CTO staying updated on technology shifts affecting his industry.
user_goal: To find recent articles discussing emerging trends relevant to his sector.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing News Articles
narrative_steps.description: David scrolls down to the News section on the homepage and clicks 'See All' to view latest posts.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'See All News' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He lands on the News page displaying articles in a masonry-style grid layout.

narrative_steps.title: Reading an Article
narrative_steps.description: He finds an intriguing headline and clicks the article card to dive deeper into the topic.
narrative_steps.action: Click an article thumbnail/card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full article opens either in a modal or a new page with readable formatting and metadata.

requirement_tested: Customer cases and success stories section
user_persona: A procurement officer assessing vendor credibility before partnership.
user_goal: To review past successes and evaluate how well the vendor delivers results.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Success Stories
narrative_steps.description: Maria clicks the 'Cases' link in the navigation to explore proven outcomes.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Cases' link in the main navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Accordion-style panels appear, each summarizing a client challenge, solution, and result.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Story Details
narrative_steps.description: She selects one case study header to see detailed implementation insights.
narrative_steps.action: Click the header of a success story panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The panel expands to show extended content including measurable impact metrics.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Full Report
narrative_steps.description: Wanting official documentation, Maria clicks to download the complete PDF version.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download PDF' button associated with the expanded story.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A file download prompt initiates, saving the full case study document locally.

requirement_tested: Contact page with form for user inquiries
user_persona: A startup founder seeking custom software advice.
user_goal: To reach out directly with questions about building a tailored application.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Rajesh clicks the 'Contact Us' link at the bottom of the homepage looking to initiate communication.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Contact' link in the footer navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Contact page loads with a centered form containing fields for name, email, company, and message.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: After filling in his details, Rajesh submits the inquiry expecting confirmation of receipt.
narrative_steps.action: Fill all required fields and click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A toast notification confirms successful submission, indicating the message was sent.

requirement_tested: Search functionality for browsing relevant information
user_persona: A marketing director searching for integration capabilities among listed products.
user_goal: To quickly locate content related to API integrations across services and products.

narrative_steps.title: Using Global Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: While browsing the homepage, Lisa notices the search bar and begins typing a query.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'integration' into the global search bar located in the header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Autocomplete suggestions populate dynamically in a dropdown grouped by content type (articles, products, services).

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Relevant Result
narrative_steps.description: Lisa sees a promising article suggestion and clicks it to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click the suggested article item in the search dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is taken to the selected article page providing detailed information on integrations.

requirement_tested: Responsive design optimized for small to medium-sized businesses
user_persona: A sales executive reviewing vendor websites on his tablet during travel.
user_goal: To seamlessly navigate and consume content regardless of device used.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Layout Adaptation
narrative_steps.description: On his tablet, Marcus resizes the browser window to simulate different screen widths.
narrative_steps.action: Manually resize the browser window to trigger various breakpoints.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout elements reflow appropriately, fonts scale, and navigation adapts for optimal viewing at each size.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting via Touch
narrative_steps.description: While viewing a carousel of featured products, he swipes left to see more items.
narrative_steps.action: Swipe horizontally across a product carousel on a mobile screen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Carousel transitions smoothly between slides based on touch gesture input.

user_persona: A non-technical business owner wanting clear explanations of complex concepts.
user_goal: To grasp key offerings easily without needing prior technical knowledge.

narrative_steps.title: Scanning Homepage Highlights
narrative_steps.description: Susan scrolls slowly through the homepage observing animated elements and structured content.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically down the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Animated text fades in progressively, enhancing engagement while maintaining clarity of messaging.

requirement_tested: Consistent color scheme with misty rose backgrounds and firebrick components
user_persona: A designer checking brand consistency across digital assets.
user_goal: To validate adherence to specified color palette throughout the entire site.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Color Usage
narrative_steps.description: Alex inspects element styles using DevTools to confirm correct background and accent colors.
narrative_steps.action: Right-click any page element and inspect its computed CSS styles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background color is consistently '#FFE4E1' (misty rose), and interactive components are styled with '#B22222' (firebrick).

requirement_tested: Navigation menu for seamless browsing across sections
user_persona: A visitor unfamiliar with the site trying to locate specific information efficiently.
user_goal: To effortlessly jump between major content areas without confusion.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: On a mobile phone, Tom taps the hamburger icon to reveal hidden menu links.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the hamburger menu icon in the top right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A vertical dropdown menu slides open revealing all primary navigation links.

narrative_steps.title: Jumping to Target Section
narrative_steps.description: Tom selects the 'Products' option to explore available software solutions.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Products' link within the revealed navigation drawer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Products page loads instantly, allowing him to continue exploring.

user_persona: A busy executive who wants focused reading without distractions.
user_goal: To read long-form articles comfortably without visual clutter.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Reading Mode
narrative_steps.description: While viewing an article, Jordan activates reading mode to reduce peripheral distractions.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Reading Mode' toggle button on the article page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Surrounding UI dims, centering attention solely on the article text for improved focus.

user_persona: A digital marketer auditing website performance in search rankings.
user_goal: To ensure proper indexing and rich snippets display in search engine results.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Meta Tags
narrative_steps.description: Emily views the page source to confirm presence of essential SEO metadata.
narrative_steps.action: Right-click the page and select 'View Page Source'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Meta tags such as title, description, Open Graph properties, and JSON-LD structured data are present and correctly formatted.

requirement_tested: Accessibility compliance for inclusive user experience
user_persona: A visually impaired user navigating the site with assistive technologies.
user_goal: To fully interact with the website using only keyboard controls and screen reader support.

narrative_steps.title: Keyboard Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Without a mouse, John tabs through interactive elements starting from the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Tab key repeatedly to move focus through navigational links and buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Focus moves logically between controls, highlighting each element visibly as focus shifts.

narrative_steps.title: Screen Reader Compatibility
narrative_steps.description: Using a screen reader, Sarah listens to how the homepage content is announced.
narrative_steps.action: Activate screen reader and listen to the announcement of page elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All headings, images with alt-text, and interactive components are accurately described by the screen reader.

requirement_tested: Performance optimization for fast loading times
user_persona: A remote worker accessing the site over a slow internet connection.
user_goal: To experience minimal delays when browsing pages despite limited bandwidth.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Initial Load Speed
narrative_steps.description: Upon first visit, Mark notes how quickly the homepage renders above-the-fold content.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage in a fresh browser session.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Above-the-fold content appears almost instantly due to optimized critical resource loading.
